ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: Captures reason dose was changed or modified. The reason may be chosen from a sponsor defined list (for example, adverse event, insufficient response, etc.) or entered as free text. May be used for variations from protocol-specified doses, or changes from expected doses.
